医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
深度学习模型在 MRI 检测前列腺癌方面与放射科医生相媲美研究人员评估了全自动深度学习模型识别具有临床意义的前列腺癌的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Deep-learning-model-rivals-radiists-in-detecting-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Deep-learning-model-rivals-radiists-in-detecting-prostate-cancer-on-MRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=400b9d8b-134e-48a7-8174-fdf660a98d2d Sun, 11 Aug 2024 21:03:00 -0400 Deep learning model rivals radiologists in detecting prostate cancer on MRI
热量限制和治疗组合重塑肠道微生物组，促进女性心理健康研究发现，将热量限制与心理干预相结合可以显着改变肠道微生物群，并改善女性与压力相关的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Calorie-restriction-and-therapy-combo-reshapes-gut-microbiome-boosts-mental-health-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Calorie-restriction-and-therapy-combo-reshapes-gut-microbiome-boosts-mental-health-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e8fdd42-57c9-42ec-8e36-d4c7cccfa3fb Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:55:00 -0400 Calorie restriction and therapy combo reshapes gut microbiome, boosts mental health in women
产前 BPA 暴露与男孩自闭症风险相关研究表明，产前接触 BPA 会扰乱男性大脑中的芳香酶活性，可能导致类似自闭症的症状。 10-HDA 治疗有望逆转这些影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Prenatal-BPA-exposure-tied-to-autism-risk-in-boys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Prenatal-BPA-exposure-tied-to-autism-risk-in-boys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79adae68-c1b6-4686-b81f-01a1cec60c0d Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:46:00 -0400 Prenatal BPA exposure tied to autism risk in boys
绝育期间的输卵管切除术可能是降低卵巢癌风险的安全选择一项研究显示，在绝育过程中通过腹腔镜手术切除输卵管的女性，其手术并发症仅比单纯切除输卵管的女性稍多一些。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Salpingection-during-sterilization-can-be-a-safe-option-to-reduce-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240811/Salpingection-during-sterilization-can-be-a-safe-option-to-reduce-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2947b613-9757-4857-a55d-7b52debfe29a Sun, 11 Aug 2024 20:20:00 -0400 Salpingectomy during sterilization can be a safe option to reduce ovarian cancer risk
研究揭示身体健康如何通过大脑通路影响心理健康伦敦大学学院、墨尔本大学和剑桥大学的一项新研究表明，涉及器官和大脑的多种生物途径在身心健康中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-reveals-how-physical-health-impacts-mental-health-via-brain-pathways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-reveals-how-physical-health-impacts-mental-health-via-brain-pathways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2c3f5a5-285f-4e4d-a16e-a183c02b609b Fri, 09 Aug 2024 23:14:34 -0400 Study reveals how physical health impacts mental health via brain pathways
麻省大学阿默斯特分校和塔夫茨医疗中心启动研究，以改善被监禁者的艾滋病毒护理马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校和塔夫茨医疗中心正在进行一项研究，为波士顿地区被监禁的阿片类药物使用障碍患者提供艾滋病毒预防、诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/UMass-Amherst-and-Tufts-Medical-Center-launch-study-to-improve-HIV-care-for-incarcerated-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/UMass-Amherst-and-Tufts-Medical-Center-launch-study-to-improve-HIV-care-for-incarcerated-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e3474ae-7f03-4814-bd6b-6643433d2330 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 23:00:29 -0400 UMass Amherst and Tufts Medical Center launch study to improve HIV care for incarcerated individuals
调查：尽管热浪频率增加，但大多数人不知道冷却中心的位置NASA 数据显示 2024 年 7 月 22 日是有记录以来最热的一天，并且有迹象表明 7 月可能是最热的月份，安纳伯格公共政策中心 7 月中旬进行的一项调查发现，大多数人都知道高温的三种症状相关疾病，但不知道最近的冷却中心的位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Survey-Most-people-unaware-of-cooling-center-locations-despite-increasing-heat-wave-Frequency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Survey-Most-people-unaware-of-cooling-center-locations-despite-increasing-heat-wave-Frequency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a71248e4-aa87-4c00-8ed1-d676b765b9e5 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 22:54:18 -0400 Survey: Most people unaware of cooling center locations despite increasing heat wave frequency
气候驱动的野火污染物损害了美国东北部的空气质量罗格斯大学健康中心的研究表明，气候驱动的野火事件正在迅速长距离传输含有有毒化学物质的有害颗粒物，损害了新泽西州和纽约市地区的空气质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Climate-driven-wildfire-pollutants-compromise-air-quality-in-Northeast-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Climate-driven-wildfire-pollutants-compromise-air-quality-in-Northeast-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b99c0aa-90f9-431f-84c6-f9d54fa86486 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 22:49:43 -0400 Climate-driven wildfire pollutants compromise air quality in Northeast U.S.
研究揭示 NPAS4 如何调节药物背景关联并影响复发大多数人在看到糖洒在柜台上后都不会三思而后行。但对于有吸食可卡因史的人来说，这种视觉提示可能会引发他们与过去吸毒的强烈联系，并产生寻求吸毒的冲动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-reveals-how-NPAS4-regulates-drug-context-associations-and-impacts-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/Study-reveals-how-NPAS4-regulates-drug-context-associations-and-impacts-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b3c868c-1480-4e5a-a99e-fda7680585be Fri, 09 Aug 2024 22:42:52 -0400 Study reveals how NPAS4 regulates drug-context associations and impacts relapse
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 新拨款支​​持关于多发性硬化症跌倒恐惧的研究泰勒·塔克拉，博士韦恩州立大学医学院转化神经科学项目的候选人，最近获得了美国国立卫生研究院尤尼斯·肯尼迪·施赖弗国家儿童健康和人类发展研究所提供的为期两年、价值 96,812 美元的 F31 资助，用于研究对跌倒的恐惧患有多发性硬化症（MS）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-NIH-grant-supports-study-on-fear-of-falling-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240809/New-NIH-grant-supports-study-on-fear-of-falling-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=635adf79-32af-4654-a9b0-be5b2f4d5082 Fri, 09 Aug 2024 22:37:00 -0400 New NIH grant supports study on fear of falling in multiple sclerosis
